---
title: "RNAtranslator: Modeling protein-conditional RNA design as sequence-to-sequence natural language translation"
authors: "Tabrizi, S.S., Barazandeh, S., Aghdam, H.H., Cicek, A.E."
venue: "PLOS Computational Biology"

We frame protein-conditional RNA design as a sequence-to-sequence translation problem, treating protein sequences as source language and RNA sequences as target language. This approach leverages transformer architectures to generate RNA sequences optimized for specific protein targets.
